content.text:
[@Justin Abrahms](@fhHAV9+vk4pGf4uePLDSR/KxppwcBbu1t/tXuQwiA5o=.ed25519) 

I think you'll need to switch those `--expose` flags out for `-p` flags, which expose the port to the host network interface. I've written a one-liner below that seems to have network connectivity, but I can't see it from Manyverse:

```sh
docker run \
  --interactive \
  --tty \
  --user 1000:1000 \
  -p 8007-8009:8007-8009/tcp \
  -p 8008:8008/udp \
  node:10 sh -c "npx ssb-server start"
```
